commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Now then, time for practice! Time to give it our all for the upcoming School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You're so full of enthusiasm, Honoka.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: She's probably just hoping to work off all the stress she built up from studying.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: You're in the same boat though, aren't you Nico?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Only the Nijigasaki girls have to score 60 or above on their exams, not us. How come we have to study like this too?

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's already set in stone. We're not going back on it now.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: To be completely honest, having study sessions after practice or a weekend gathering sure is tiring.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Though it also makes me hungrier than usual, which makes food taste even better.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: If that's the case, why don't we hold our study sessions before instead?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I don't think it'll make much of a difference.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Besides, if anyone is to blame for this, it's Honoka and Nico for slacking on their daily studies.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: You wouldn't be failing subjects if you paid attention in class and did your homework every day.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: But I just get so sleepy when I hear the teacher's voice.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Study all you want, it's not like we're gonna use any of it in the real world.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: That's what all students who hate studying say.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: You seem to be forgetting what's important right now. If you keep failing, you're not going to be able to move up a grade or graduate, let alone go out into the real world.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: I'll be counting on you if we wind up in the same class, Nico!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Hold up, why are you implying I'll be held back twice?!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: It's not entirely unthinkable, given the circumstances.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Repeat a grade? That's the last thing I want to do.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Then let's work hard in these study sessions so that doesn't happen, okay?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Okaaay...

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: One, two, one, two, one, two. Hey, what's wrong? What are you slowing down for? This is a run, not a walk!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* You're pushing us way too hard, Kanan.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I can't...go on...

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Were this a moonlit night, I could handle this with ease. But I can only perform to half of my true potential under the rays of the sun.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I've also hit my limit, zura...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: S-Slow down a little.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You're all a bunch of whiners. Being a school idol is a test of stamina! Running is essential if you don't wanna wear yourself out in the second half of a live show.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Exactly! I totally agree, but you're making us go way too fast!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: A-At this rate, I'm going to fall apart before I build up any stamina...

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You'll wear everyone out if you keep up this pace.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Fine, I suppose we can have a little break.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Thank goodness, zura.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I wish you would direct a little of that determination towards your studies.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Wh-What we're doing right now has nothing to do with studying!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: You're just a bundle of energy when we're in practice, but the second we start studying, you get all meek on us.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Indeed. While school idol activities are important, you must not forget that you are also a student.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I-I know. If I just put my mind to it, I...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Then I will be giving you a thorough lecture today so you can surpass the 60 mark and score 80 instead!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Um... How about we drop the pace a little and take it easy from here? Nothing good comes out of pushing yourself too hard, right? Yup!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Chuckle* Oh, Kanan.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Everyone, you're losing balance. Focus on your core!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Urgh... It hurts so much. My thighs are wobbling like jelly.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Ayumu, you're doing fine. You're able to do this a lot longer now than compared to when you first started!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, this really shows how much we've all grown.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: But it's still really tough.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Snore*

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She's fallen asleep on her feet. That's some skill.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: This might be tough, but it's way easier than studying!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Geez, do you really hate studying that much, Karin? It's actually pretty fun when you get into it.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I want to get smart without studying!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You really hate it that much, huh...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: You won't ever improve if you run away from your weaknesses. We need to show Mifune that we can do this if we want to make the School Idol Festival a success as well.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Urgh, you're right. I'll score over 60 and prove to her what I'm made out of!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Although, I do have a blast with school idol stuff AND studying 'cause we're all doing it together.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, me too. It really is fun to study with you all.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I have also come to enjoy not only practicing, but sitting at our desks all together as well.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: There is no time like the present. We should enjoy ourselves wholeheartedly so we never regret this time together.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Well then, here you go! I brought some snacks today!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, I did too!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Gasp* Did somebody mention snacks?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Food is just about the only thing that can wake you up this quickly.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'm all about good timing.

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Ahahaha!
